name: Vegan Mexican Stuffed Baked Potato
description: This stuffed potato is packed with protein and the perfect quick and easy lunch from ingredients you have on hand.
recipeIngredient: 1 hd. Broccoli (cut into florettes, steamed or boiled)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes on high in microwave for 5 minutes or bake in oven at 425F for 50 to 60 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook potatoes on high in microwave for 5 minutes or bake in oven at 425F for 50 to 60 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make a cut lengthwise in the potatoes and stuff with cooked broccoli, black beans, and diced tomato.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a cut lengthwise in the potatoes and stuff with cooked broccoli, black beans, and diced tomato.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour salsa verde over the whole thing.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour salsa verde over the whole thing.

keywords: mexican stuffed potato, vegan stuffed potato
